name: node_modules-path
description: Get the path of the `node_modules` folder in your scripts or CLI or package.json
author: lexoyo

scripts.test: mkdir -p node_modules && npm run test:cli && npm run test:cli1 && npm run test:js
scripts.test:cli1: mkdir -p node_modules/module1 && if [[ `./bin.js module1` == "`pwd`/node_modules" ]]; then echo 'ok'; else echo "ERROR: `./bin.js module1`" && exit 1; fi && rmdir node_modules/module1
scripts.test:cli: if [[ `./bin.js` == "`pwd`/node_modules" ]]; then echo 'ok'; else echo "ERROR: `./bin.js`" && exit 1; fi
